actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to create the Indian Peaks Wilderness Area in the Arapaho and Roosevelt National Forests in Colorado and to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of revising the boundaries of the Rocky Mountain National Park.

summary.text: Creates the Indian Peaks Wilderness Area in the Arapaho and Roosevelt National Forests, Colorado. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of revising the boundaries of the Rocky Mountain National Park to include the Indian Peaks Wilderness Area.

titles.title: A bill to create the Indian Peaks Wilderness Area in the Arapaho and Roosevelt National Forests in Colorado and to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of revising the boundaries of the Rocky Mountain National Park.
